title: Executive Order 5655-Public Water Restoration No. 69, Arizona
content: So much of Executive order of May 25, 1920, creating Public Water Reserve No. 72, Arizona, as affects the land hereinafter listed is hereby revoked, and all such land not otherwise reserved or withdrawn is hereby restored to the public domain and shall become subject to disposition under the laws applicable thereto upon such date and after such notice as may be hereafter determined and announced.

T. 21 S., R. 17 E., sec. US, W. ½ SE. ¼ NW. ¼ SE. ¼, SW.¼ NW. ¼ SE. ¼, NW. ¼ SW. ¼ SE. ¼, W. ½ SE. ¼ SW. ¼ SE. ¼, SW. ¼ SW. ¼ SE. ¼, E. ½ SE. ¼ NE. ¼ SW. ¼, E. ½ NE. ¼ SE. ¼ SW. ¼, E. ½ SE. ¼ SE. ¼ SW. ¼.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5655-Public Water Restoration No. 69, Arizona Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361376
